items.title: Self Hosted
items.description: An extensive searchable list of the best self hosted software developers.

items.title: CSS Layout
items.description: A collection of popular layouts and patterns made with CSS.

items.title: Labels are a last resort
items.description: A good guide by the people of Refactorig UI about the usage of labels in UI.

items.title: Deep Sea
items.description: A really cool demo by Neal Agarwal. It's also totally worth to check out his other stuff!

items.title: react-spring
items.description: A simple, spring-physics based animation library that should cover most of your UI related animation.

items.title: Leonardo
items.description: A colors generator based on a desired contrast ratio for beautiful, accessible, and adaptive color systems.

items.title: CSS: An Art, a Science, a Nightmare
items.description: An in depth article about CSS by Tania Rascia for people who have had to touch CSS a few times but ultimately don't feel like they know what they're doing, or struggle with making basic layouts.

items.title: Responsive Image Breakpoints Generator
items.description: Easily generate the optimal responsive image dimensions.

items.title: The State of UX in 2020
items.description: From the tools we'll use, to our process, to the behaviors that will change the way we design — here's a list of what to expect for User Experience (UX) Design in the next year.

items.title: 6 GitHub Repos For Instant Knowledge Boost
items.description: Mirosław Farajewicz lists a bunch of smaller and more single-subject repositories.
